original_title: Truck runs into multiple vehicles in Kaleliya; Four hospitalised
original_body_lines: At least four persons were hospitalised after a truck crashed into many vehicles at Kaleliya on the Pasyala-Mirigama road this evening.
Police said the truck rammed against 8 three-wheelers, a car and a motorcycle before crashing into a wall, reportedly due to brake failure of the truck.
Police said heavy traffic was reported in the area following the accident.
